turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. I was just wondering if you could help me order some pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need two medium pizzas with sausage and mushroom on them, both of them with gluten-free crusts.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you wanted sausage and mushroom for both?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, you are ordering 2 medium gluten free pizzas with sausage and mushrooms.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $38, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick-up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to be picking it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Would you mind giving me their address?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, bella luna's is located on 123 main street.
